award_title: III: Small: Enhancing Adversarial Robustness of Geospatio-Temporal Models
subject: Getting credit when others use your adversarial techniques
body:
Adversarial ML work needs to be reproducible to have impact, but sharing trained models and attack code that others can actually run is a mess.

I built Ouro to help researchers share computational stuff (models, code, environments) in a way that's durable and usable, not just a GitHub link that breaks in six months. Citations matter, but so does making your techniques actually usable.

Worth a quick chat? I know it's heading into the holidays, so January works too.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
